mapper.select: SELECT BNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , REGDATE , BIMG , BTHUMBIMG FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno}

SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT FROM ( SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND BNO > 0
